entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vineland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 3:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: 9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 44 %
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: SSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low plus 2 with temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2 with temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the morning. High 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening then light after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
